events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The customer's message indicates a refund request related to an unsuitable product size.
Support agent Jane Doe has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! I’m Jane from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and explain if the jacket was worn or damaged in any way?
My order number is 123456, and the jacket is brand new; I just tried it on at home and realized it’s too small.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund upon receiving the returned item. I will send you the shipping label to return the jacket.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was completed successfully and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us.
